document_data.caption: A map showing Ssundyl on the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Ssundyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Ssundyl''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Durpar]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Ssundyl was located in central Durpar. The coastal town sat along the northern shore of the [[Golden Water]] due west of [[Adama's Tooth]].
